title: [Ta'Illistim, Caear Var]
description: The var bends around the small park outside the Ta'Illistim Keep.  Kidney-shaped flower beds filled with deep purple iris line a crushed gravel walkway that leads up to the building.  Wide slate steps rise to the carved oak doors that open into the eastern entry tower.

The var bends around the small park outside of Ta'Illistim Keep.  Kidney-shaped flowerbeds, filled with white irises, line the stony sides of a staircase leading into the building.  High above, the reflective surface of one of the Keep's famously mosaicked domes bristles with sapphire and silver pennons.

The var bends around the edge of the green that borders Ta'Illistim Keep.  High above, the night-shrouded surface of one of the Keep's famously mosaicked domes bristles with sapphire and silver pennons.
The var bends around the edge of the green that borders Ta'Illistim Keep.  High above, the reflective surface of one of the Keep's famously mosaicked domes bristles with sapphire and silver pennons.
